sentences.english: Favorite hobbies include archeology, archery, astrophysics, flamenco dancing, and designing clothes.
sentences.chinese: 考古，射箭，天體物理，弗拉明戈舞和服裝設計。

sentences.english: When you shoot an arrow , you draw the bow .
Being a descent of Xibo People, archery is my passion.
sentences.chinese: 作爲錫伯族的後裔，射箭是我的熱愛。

sentences.english: Chu has a well-known archery bear experts called drainage sub.
sentences.chinese: 楚國有一位著名的射箭能手名叫熊渠子。

sentences.english: An ancient Indian sage was teaching his disciples the archery.
sentences.chinese: 一位古印度智者正向他的弟子們傳授射箭術。

sentences.english: Arrow-shooting is a normal skill for the cannibals, with it, they can hunt wild pigs.
sentences.chinese: 射箭是食人族平常必須訓練的技能，獵殺山豬就靠它。

sentences.english: Venus ratio with shoot arrow in the curved bow.
sentences.chinese: 愛神丘比特正在彎弓射箭。

sentences.english: I will shoot three arrows to the side of it, as though I were shooting at a target.
sentences.chinese: 我要向磐石旁邊射三箭，如同射箭靶一樣。

sentences.english: For even as He loves the arrow that flies.
sentences.chinese: 因爲射箭者固然愛那飛出的箭。

sentences.english: No wonder every Xibe man is good at archery.
sentences.chinese: 難怪錫伯族的人啊個個都善於拉弓射箭的。

sentences.english: The king of the State of Wei appreciates his archery very much and often goes hunting with him.
sentences.chinese: 魏國國王很欣賞他的射箭技術經常和他一起去打獵。

sentences.english: And I will shoot three arrows on the side thereof, as though I shot at a mark.
sentences.chinese: 我要向磐石旁邊射三箭，如同射箭靶一樣。

sentences.english: Flash:Kim Woojin of Korea wins gold in Men's Individual of Archery.
sentences.chinese: 韓國選手金優鎮獲射箭男子個人的金牌。

sentences.english: In the Spring and Autumn Period, there was an expert archer.
sentences.chinese: 春秋時代有個人射箭的技術非常高超。

sentences.english: When the hunter saw the unsuspecting mountain buck, he shot his arrow and killed him instantly.
sentences.chinese: 獵人看到這隻意外出現的山鹿，立馬射箭殺死了他。

definition: to shoot dead (with a gun, or bow and arrow)
ancient banquet game of throwing arrows into a pot, the winner determined by the number of arrows thrown in, and the loser required to drink as punishment
